channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Script Security Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Script Security Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003000|2024-08-05T03:00:19.257Z -- jenkins%20project -- script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Script Security Plugin 1.49 and earlier in src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/scriptsecurity/sandbox/groovy/GroovySandbox.java that allows attackers with the ability to provide sandboxed scripts to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.
